Title: Personal branding analysis of food blogger cindy lulaby through instagram social media
Source title: International Journal of Scientific and Technology Research
Affiliations: Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Hendrawan, A., Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Nahdiah, S., Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This study is proposed to determine the strategy of @cnlulaby as a food blogger in building personal branding through social media Instagram. The type of research used in this study is a qualitative method with a descriptive approach. This research shows that personal branding performed by @cnlulaby through social media Instagram using special strategies applied from some personal branding concept that is personality, leadership, specialization, persistence and goodwill. Therefore, through social media Instagram, personal branding created by @cnlulaby has formed a positive perspective on her. © 2019, International Journal of Scientific and Technology Research. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Food Blogger; Personal Branding; Social Media Instagram; Strategies
